onStartUpEnabled.label: Enable on Chatbot start
onStartUpEnabled.tooltip: Should the invest be enabled on startup of chatbot? If not, you have to start it with the Start Invest Command.

investFileName.label: Invest Filename
investFileName.tooltip: Invest File Name. File has to be inside plugin itself

investGoalFileName.label: Invest Goal Filename
investGoalFileName.tooltip: Invest Goal File Name. You don't have to use his. Will just print stuff like '3000 / 10000'

investSound.label: Invest Sound Filename
investSound.tooltip: Invest Sound File Name. Leave empty to disable. File has to be inside plugin itself!

command.label: Invest command
command.tooltip: Command for everyone to invest. Default !invest

commandStart.label: Start Invest command
commandStart.tooltip: Command for Caster to start invest. Default !startInvest

commandStop.label: Stop Invest command
commandStop.tooltip: Command for Caster to stop invest. Default !stopInvest

commandSet.label: Set Invest command
commandSet.tooltip: Command for Caster to set invest to a given value. Default !setInvest

commandReset.label: Reset Invest command
commandReset.tooltip: Command for Caster to reset invest. Default !resetInvest

commandSetGoal.label: Set Invest Goal command
commandSetGoal.tooltip: Command for Caster to set goal. Optional. Just needed for the new txt  invest. Default !setInvestGoal

languageInvestDone.value: {0} has invested {1} {2}! New invest value is {3}
languageInvestDone.label: languageInvestDone

languageErrorMinimumAmount.value: You have to invest at least {0} {1}!
languageErrorMinimumAmount.label: languageErrorMinimumAmount

languageErrorAlreadyStarted.value: Invest is already in progress. Stop the invest first!
languageErrorAlreadyStarted.label: languageErrorAlreadyStarted

languageErrorAlreadyStopped.value: An active invest is currently not running!
languageErrorAlreadyStopped.label: languageErrorAlreadyStopped

languageInvestStarted.value: {0} has opend the invest! Use '{1} <{2}-99999>' to invest. The current invest value is {3}.
languageInvestStarted.label: languageInvestStarted

languageInvestResetted.value: {0} has resetted and disabled the invest!
languageInvestResetted.label: languageInvestResetted
